content:
Destination Wedding In Paradise

Planning a Key West destination wedding? The Marker Waterfront Resort offers you and your partner endless possibilities to host your unforgettable day! Our Old Town conch-style architecture, lush tropical gardens, and serenity pool creates a magical backdrop for your wedding day. Everything you need for your special day is within your reach when you choose The Marker Waterfront Resort.  

Start your wedding weekend out with an elegant rehearsal dinner poolside at our serenity pool. Plan your intimate ceremony in our gardens surrounded by luscious tropical foliage, followed by an outdoor cocktail reception on our wrap around veranda, bordered by the neighborhoods and architecture of Old Town Key West, and get the party started in our newly built Harbor House Ballroom. With multiple venue options and catering provided by the Southernmost Beach Cafe, you won’t find a more beautiful place for your wedding than the Marker Waterfront Resort. Sit back, relax, and let our destination wedding specialists and catering team help you from beginning to end.
Get in touch with sales@markerkeywest.com to Request Proposal
